lyrics.text: We bring joy to people's heart
We plant garden and flowers around
We spread hopes, and make our communities proud, the most wonderful feeling
Even when tired, during our work, we're happy
We benefit and receive great benefit as well
Giving is our instinct, from it our happiness springs
With love we sow our seeds, and reap the huge harvest it brings
We bring joy to people's heart
We plant garden and flowers around
We spread hopes, and make our communities proud, the most wonderful feeling
Even when tired, during our work, we're happy
A smile on the faces of all mankind
Love and peace spread all around...
What a beautiful world if we leave a mark behind.. for the remainder of the time
Under its shade, it has gathered us all
From it we've learned how to rise & ascend
We benefit and receive great benefit as well
Giving is our instinct, from it our happiness springs
With love we sow our seeds, and reap the huge harvest it brings
We bring joy to people's heart
We plant garden and flowers around
We spread hopes, and make our communities proud, the most wonderful feeling
Even when tired, during our work, we're happy
We benefit and receive great benefit as well
Giving is our instinct, from it our happiness springs
With love we sow our seeds, and reap the huge harvest it brings
We bring joy to people's heart
We plant garden and flowers around

ايــــه أصير أحسن، أصير أحسن، أصير أحسن
ايه أصير أحسن ولا يمنعني شي
ايه أصير أحسن بما إني نويت
ايه أصير أحسن ولو قالوا جنون
ايه أصير أحسن فلا قالٍ وقيل

So don't moron for what's gone,
And if life has choked you on,
Haven't we overpassed the failings (we have.. we have)
And life has come back to its normal.
even if it lasted so long, is nothing but moments
So, drone with me these words,
Optimize about good,and you shall find good,
And you don't know, it might be goodness, it might be goodness
Optimize about good, and you shall find good
And you don't know, it might be goodness, it might be goodness
So don't moron for what has gone.
Both worlds have their own troubles,
For you're not alone, oh you Careworn
But we ease it on ourselves,
For man's situation never stays the same,
No, no, no it never stays the same
To move one steady after it,
so drone with me these words
Optimize about good,and you shall find good,
And you don't know, it might be goodness, it might be goodness

And you don't know, it might be goodness, it might be goodness

In order to keep up with them,
I imitated their looks and exterior
So I became someone else, just to boast
And I thought that through that I'd gained a fortune
But I found that I'd lost, for these are mere appearances
In order to increase in beauty
Our essence is here, in our hearts it shines
We will not seek to please others with that
Which we deem to unbefitting for ourselves
That is our beauty, rising and ascending above

Be curious... and aks a lot of questions,
Be curious... and release your imagination.
Ask, and you'll find the answer,
Will learn secrets of the universe.

Tell it to people and repeat it...
Be curious... and aks a lot of questions,

A generation that enquires and asks
Is a happier and more beautiful generation

O paradise, O affection, O eyes which spend the night sleepless over us.
O refuge, O safety, O nectar from the most fragrant roses.
I will never be able to repay the gratitude of your palms, for it is God that will reward you the gardens of the Hereafter.
All the languages of the world utter your name, my mother
And join their lips and call out to you, my mother.
O Mama, O Yomma, O Yamma, O Mamty, O Mamy, O Ummi
Ever since I was born, and the letter "M" is dancing in my mouth
And so it plays with me, and comforts me in the darkness.
And the light radiates in my eyes as I utter "mother"
يا جناناً، يا حناناً، يا عيوناً باتت لنا ساهرة
يا ملاذاُ، يا أماناً، يا رحيقاً من زهورٍ عاطرة
لن أوفيكِ شكر كفّيكِ، فالله يجزيكِ جنان الآخرة
كل لغات العالم تنطق باسمكِ أمي
وتضمّ شفاهاً وتنادي لكِ يا أمي
ماما يا يُمّه يا يَمّه يا ممتي يا مامي يا أمّي
منذُ ولدت وحرف الميم تراقص بفمي
I'm not one of those who say ‘My father was so-and-so’ I say, instead, to the whole world ‘Here I am!’
Purpose and persistence fill my heart I won’t be swayed by what people say
Here I am, here I am! Filling life with joy and optimism
Here I am, here I am! The impossible won’t stop me, never!
How they told me, “You will remain here. You won’t make it, look how long the road is!”
I didn’t listen to them, that’s just the way I am Free, unrestrained, with confidence I build
Here I am, here I am! Filling life with joy and optimism
Here I am, here I am! The impossible won’t stop me, never!
My path is not one of roses Thorns cover it all the way till the end
But if I stumble I find an open hand: My family's love, their closeness, the loyalty of a friend
I won’t forget that one day I strove and was lifted To where I sing to the whole world
Here I am, here I am! Filling life with joy and optimism
Here I am, here I am! The impossible won’t stop me, never!
Here I am, here I am! Filling life with joy and optimism
Here I am, here I am! The impossible won’t stop me, never!
أنا لست ممن قال كان أبي، بل قلت للأكوان هأنذا
عزم و إصرار ملا قلبي، لم يثنني قولٌ لذاك و ذا
هأنذا هأنذا، أروي الحياة سعادةً وتفاؤلا
هأنذا هأنذا، لا مستحيل يعيقني في الكون لا
كم قال لي بعضٌ: "ستبقى هنا، انظر لطول الدرب، لن تجني"
ما كنت أسمعهم فذاك أنا، حرٌ طليقٌ واثقاً أبني
هأنذا هأنذا، أروي الحياة سعادة و تفاؤلا
هأنذا هأنذا، لا مستحيل يعيقني في الكون لا
ليس دربي من ورود، كان شوكاً قاسياً طول الطريق
إن تعثرت ألاقي من يجود، حب أهلي، قربهم، صدق الصديق
لست أنسى أنني يوما سعيت، فارتقيت، كي أغني للوجود
هأنذا هأنذا، أروي الحياة سعادة و تفاؤلا
هأنذا هأنذا، لا مستحيل يعيقني في الكون لا
